Sequence Information.Source: Bumblebee,Bombus ardens, insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (50%) toDP-1L= 29%, K=24%, A=S=12%; GRAVY:  0.03; M Wt: 3460.101; Mol formula: C156H262N48O39; Mol ex coeff: 1490.Activity: active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 32 ug/ml), S. enteritidis (MIC 64 ug/ml),  and S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 64-128 ug/ml).Toxicity: porcine RBC HC50>128 ug/ml. Updated 12/2022
Literature Information.Author: Lin D, Sutherland D, Aninta SI, Louie N, Nip KM, Li C, Yanai A, Coombe L, Warren RL, Helbing CC, Hoang LMN, Birol I. 2022
Literature Information.Title: Mining Amphibian and Insect Transcriptomes for Antimicrobial Peptide Sequences with rAMPage
